text: Punta Paratella Lighthouse () is an active lighthouse located on the northernmost extremity of Gorgona, one the islands of the Tuscan Archipelago, from Livorno. ==Description== The lighthouse consists of a cylindrical white fibreglass tower high, placed at above sea level. The lantern is powered by a solar unit and emits one long flash every 10 seconds visible up to . The lighthouse is fully automated and is operated by Marina Militare identified by the code number 1983 E.F. ==See also== * List of lighthouses in Italy * Gorgona ==References== == External links == * Servizio Fari Marina Militare Category:Lighthouses in Italy Category:Lighthouses completed in 1937
title: Punta Paratella Lighthouse
